lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola is not surprised Tottenham Hotspur are Manchester City's closest pursuers in the early Premier League title race having previously been out-witted by Mauricio Pochettino who he describes as one of the best managers in the world.

headline.print_headline: Pochettino One of the Best Coaches in World, Says Guardiola
headline.main: Pochettino One of the Best Coaches in World, Says Guardiola

snippet: Pep Guardiola is not surprised Tottenham Hotspur are Manchester City's closest pursuers in the early Premier League title race having previously been out-witted by Mauricio Pochettino who he describes as one of the best managers in the world....
